text: 5.45 Jop 25.3, Epe 5.1 Anɨgɨnɨgabɨm ak, Nap man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak ñapay ne yɨbɨl yenɨgabɨm agak. Ne gek, sub ak tɨkjakɨl, binɨb gɨ tɨmel gɨpal okok sek, binɨb gɨtep gɨpal okok sek kɨlop pak tep gup agak. Pen ne gek, wɨsɨp apek, binɨb teplep yɨbɨl mɨdebal okok sek, binɨb tɨmel yɨbɨl mɨdebal okok sek kɨlop, man pak tep gup agak. Anɨb ak nɨbi binɨb okok kɨlop gɨtep genɨmɨb, Nap ñapay ne yɨbɨl yenɨgabɨm agak.
